data.message: I think we need more places like that and more people  like you

replies.message: We couldn't agree with you more, Regina. Together we can create a brighter tomorrow! -Kate
I wonder how we could raise money to create more of these.

Well here in Phoenix we have a safe haven sleep for vets just a little corner they have tents and I'm making Christmas wreath and going to buy supplies that they need bike firewood trash bags I got a lot of stuff donated from people I bought some and now that the Christmas tree lights are up I'm hitting them up for the real Christmas branches and going to make more that's just one way to start out
Regina, we are looking for people who are interested in starting a similar page locally and you can email ty@facinghomelessness.org for more information.  Thank you!
